nodes.bodyText: wonder why we need to depend on this and not only on slf4j-api ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+apply plugin: "java-library"
+
+jar {
+    enabled = true
+}
+
+dependencies {
+    /*******************************
+     * API Dependencies
+     *******************************/
+
+    /*******************************
+     * Implementation Dependencies
+     *******************************/
+
+    implementation(project(':pxf-api'))
+    implementation(project(':pxf-hdfs'))
+    implementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-log4j2")

nodes.bodyText: There's a good explanation here: https://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/docs/2.0.x/reference/html/howto-logging.html but basically this provides an abstraction for logging in spring boot.

nodes.bodyText: can we reuse a single object Mapper if we do not customize its behavior ?
will make a static final for this class.
